title: Riot i just buy rito points pls
body:
pls un chat restrict me, i pay2say
i wasnt abusive just people play broken champs like pantheon and cance rlike nidalee and it makes me furious but i buy game now i buy rito points pls unchat restrict.

thank

pls no hate my spelling i am not english

replies.body: Bet OP was going to buy Pantheon skins. Git gud.

Oh no no no i not buy pantheon or his skins
http://i.gyazo.com/5aa0893650ab26aa2ff0b184ef87652a.png
see i not buy

Don't mess with me m8. You have had more than 1 account.

Checkmate atheists.
Its as if he thinks he being funny?{{summoner:3}}

You don't pay money to unban, that's not how it works.

You pay time instead.

But time = money............

Still money doesn't work in unbanning soz.

hi sir you have it wrong i do not get ban i get chat restricted my chat limited i can only say like 5 things a game this not fair as i now have bought game
